outputs.output_descr: Mainstreaming Sustainable Land Management into Ngamiland Productive Landscapes for Improving Livelihoods. The project aims to find collaborative ways of addressing rangeland degradation especially that caused by the livestock sector in the areas of Ngamiland and as a measure to further protect the core Okavango Delta, which is a Ramsar Site.

project_descr: This is to develop a Full-Sized Project Document (PRODOC)/proposal for GEF funding towards mainstreaming sustainable land management into Ngamiland landscapes for improved livelihoods.
project_title: Mainstreaming SLM in Rangeland areas of Ngamiland
